description: General stats dashboard with node selector, uses metrics from wmi_exporter

targets.expr: (sum(wmi_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance) - sum(wmi_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance)) / sum(wmi_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance) * 100

title: Windows Node
